resources.string: After 30 days free trial, subscription ($3.99) automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before current period ends. Payment will be charged to your google Account. Manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal in play store settings.

Your subscription has been expired. Start your subscription again and subscription ($3.99) automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before current period ends. Payment will be charged to your google Account. Manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal in google play store Settings.
